lyrics.line: Where there's a will, there's a way, kind of beautiful
lyrics.translation: 「有志者，事竟成」聽起來多美好

lyrics.line: And every night has its day, so magical
lyrics.translation: 每個黑夜都會迎來黎明 多麼奇妙

lyrics.line: And if there's love in this life, there's no obstacle
lyrics.translation: 若此生有愛 就能克服任何阻礙

lyrics.line: That can't be defeated
lyrics.translation: 從此無堅不摧

lyrics.line: For every tyrant a tear for the vulnerable
lyrics.translation: 為暴政下的弱勢 獻上一滴淚水

lyrics.line: In every lost soul the bones of a miracle
lyrics.translation: 每個迷失的靈魂裡 都蘊藏奇蹟

lyrics.line: For every dreamer a dream we're unstoppable
lyrics.translation: 為每個夢想家獻上美夢成真，我們勢不可擋

lyrics.line: With something to believe in
lyrics.translation: 只要我們有堅定的信念

lyrics.line: Monday left me broken
lyrics.translation: 星期一 我被命運摧殘殆盡

lyrics.line: Tuesday I was through with hoping
lyrics.translation: 星期二 我陷入了絕望的深淵

lyrics.line: Wednesday my empty arms were open
lyrics.translation: 星期三 我向你敞開一無所有的雙臂

lyrics.line: Thursday waiting for love, waiting for love
lyrics.translation: 星期四 我等著心愛的你歸來，等愛歸來

lyrics.line: Thank the stars it's Friday
lyrics.translation: 感謝上天讓我熬到了星期五

lyrics.line: I'm burning like a fire gone wild on Saturday
lyrics.translation: 星期六 我心狂野 就像燃燒炙烈的火焰

lyrics.line: Guess I won't be coming to church on Sunday
lyrics.translation: 星期天 我猜我早已 無心上教堂

lyrics.line: I'll be waiting for love, waiting for love
lyrics.translation: 我正全心全意等待著心愛的你歸來，

lyrics.line: To come around
lyrics.translation: 重回我身邊。

lyrics.line: We are one of a kind irreplaceable
lyrics.translation: 我們都是獨一無二 無法取代

lyrics.line: How did I get so blind and so cynical
lyrics.translation: 我怎會變得如此 盲目又憤世嫉俗呢

lyrics.line: If there's love in this life we're unstoppable
lyrics.translation: 若此生有愛 我們就能克服任何障礙

lyrics.line: No we can't be defeated
lyrics.translation: 從此無堅不摧
